title: Welcome to My Portfolio
main: Hi! My name is Dymitr Dworakowski. I'm a Junior Full-Stack Developer with a passion for design and creating user-friendly web applications. With a foundation in both front-end and back-end development, I focus on building efficient and engaging digital experiences. Constantly striving to expand my skills, I enjoy working on projects that challenge me to grow and contribute to impactful solutions. Let's create something amazing together!
